babel-plugin-transform-es2015-function-name

Apply ES2015 function.name semantics to all functions

Installation

sh npm install --save-dev babel-plugin-transform-es2015-function-name

Usage

Via .babelrc (Recommended)

.babelrc

json { "plugins": ["transform-es2015-function-name"] }

Via CLI

sh babel --plugins transform-es2015-function-name script.js

Via Node API

javascript require("babel-core").transform("code", { plugins: ["transform-es2015-function-name"] });
